00019 #ifndef _PLL_HPP_cm110527_
00020 #define _PLL_HPP_cm110527_
00021 
00022 #include <vector>
00023 #include <complex>
00024 
00025 namespace filter {
00026   // phase-locked loop
00027   template <typename T,
00028             class LOOP_FILTER,
00029             class INTEGRATOR>
00030   class pll {
00031   public:
00032     typedef T float_type;
00033     typedef typename std::complex<float_type> complex_type;
00034     typedef typename std::vector<complex_type> complex_vector_type;
00035     
00036     pll(double fc,
00037         double fs,
00038         double dwl, // band width
00039         const LOOP_FILTER& loop_filter,
00040         const INTEGRATOR& integrator)
00041       : loop_filter_(loop_filter)
00042       , integrator_(integrator)
00043       , f1_(0)
00044       , fc_(fc)
00045       , ts_(1./fs)
00046       , dwl_(dwl)
00047       , ppb_(0) {
00048       reset();
00049     }
00050 
00051     void update_ppb(double ppb, double fc) {
00052       ppb_ = ppb;
00053       fc_  = fc;
00054       loop_filter_.update_ppb(ppb);
00055     }
00056 
00057     // filter reset
00058     void reset() {
00059       f1_= 2*M_PI*fc();
00060       loop_filter_.reset();
00061       integrator_.reset();
00062     }
00063     
00064     // filter update
00065     double process(complex_type s) {
00066       const complex_type i_phase(float_type(0), integrator_.process(f1_*ts()));
00067       static double two_pi(2*M_PI);
00068       f1_ = two_pi*fc() + loop_filter_.process(std::arg(s * std::exp(-i_phase)));
00069       if (f1_ > two_pi*f1_upper_limit() || f1_ < two_pi*f1_lower_limit())
00070         reset();
00071       return theta();
00072     }
00073     
00074     double fc() const { return fc_; }
00075     double ts() const { return ts_*(1+ppb_*1e-9); }
00076 
00077     float_type theta() const { return integrator_.get(); }
00078     float_type uf() const { return loop_filter_.get(); }
00079     float_type f1() const { return f1_; }
00080     
00081   protected:
00082     const LOOP_FILTER& loop_filter() const { return loop_filter_; }
00083     const INTEGRATOR& integrator() const { return integrator_; }
00084 
00085     double f1_upper_limit() const { return fc()+10*dwl_; }
00086     double f1_lower_limit() const { return fc()-10*dwl_; }
00087 
00088   private:
00089     LOOP_FILTER loop_filter_;
00090     INTEGRATOR  integrator_;
00091     double f1_;               // current nco frequency
00092     double fc_;
00093     double ts_;
00094     double dwl_;
00095     double ppb_;
00096   } ;
00097 } // namespace filter
00098 #endif // _PLL_HPP_cm110527_
